attributes.action: Kick out all MP`s who betray E.U. referendum and leave E.U with out a deal
attributes.background: Why should MP`s who said they will honour electoral results so they get elected stay in parliament. the British public had spoken to leave E.U. but these MP`s say they will not let us leave E.U. now lets make these MP`S leave

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MP's from office because of their views or opinions.
